headline.main: U.S. FORCES FIGHT TO PROTECT INDIES; Batavia Reports Attacks by Japanese on One American Warship and Two Planes

lead_paragraph: BATAVIA, Netherlands Indies, Jan. 2 -- United States warships and planes already are helping the small but modern Netherland fleet to defend the Netherlands Indies, Batavia disclosed today in a communique reporting Japanese attacks on one United States warship and two planes.
abstract: Batavia repts Jap raids on Sumatra, Celebes and New Guinea non-mil points
